title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable without the focus jumping to another node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item for the first time.
3. Observe the focus jumping to the library file node.
4. Close and reopen the view.
5. Select the same item for the second time and observe that it can be selected without any issues.
